an10.155:1.1: “Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato puggalo na sevitabbo.
an10.155:1.3: Micchaditthiko hoti, micchasankappo hoti, micchavaco hoti, micchakammanto hoti, micchaajivo hoti, micchavayamo hoti, micchasati hoti, micchasamadhi hoti, micchanani hoti, micchavimutti hoti—
an10.155:1.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannagato puggalo na sevitabbo.
an10.155:2.1: Dasahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato puggalo sevitabbo.
an10.155:2.3: Sammaditthiko hoti, sammasankappo hoti, sammavaco hoti, sammakammanto hoti, sammaajivo hoti, sammavayamo hoti, sammasati hoti, sammasamadhi hoti, sammanani hoti, sammavimutti hoti—
an10.155:2.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, dasahi dhammehi samannagato puggalo sevitabbo”ti.
